diseases.name: Blast
diseases.symptoms: Spindle-shaped spots with dark brown margins and gray center on leaves. Node and neck infections cause blackening, brittleness, and grain chaffiness.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Intermittent drizzles, cloudy weather, high humidity (93-99%), low night temperature (15-20°C), excess nitrogen.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant variety CO 47, avoid excess nitrogen, apply nitrogen in three split doses, spray Carbendazim 50WP @ 500g/ha, Tricyclozole 75 WP @ 500g/ha, or Metominostrobin 20 SC @ 500ml/ha. Seed treatment with TNAU Pf liquid formulation @ 10 ml/kg.

diseases.name: Brown Leaf Spot
diseases.symptoms: Rectangular or oval brown spots with discrete margins on leaves, brown lesions on glumes and grains leading to grain discoloration.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Temperature 25-30°C, relative humidity above 80%, excess nitrogen.
diseases.prevention: Spray Metominostrobin @ 500 ml/ha at disease appearance.

diseases.name: Sheath Rot
diseases.symptoms: Dark brown or black patches on uppermost leaf sheath; panicle may not emerge fully; grains discolored.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity, temperature 25-30°C, closer planting, injuries by leaf folder or brown plant hopper.
diseases.prevention: Apply gypsum @ 500 kg/ha, spray neem oil 3%, Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha, Metominostrobin @ 500 ml/ha, or Hexaconazole 75% WG @ 100 mg/l. Seed treatment with Pseudomonas fluorescens @ 10 g/kg.

diseases.name: Sheath Blight
diseases.symptoms: Oval or ellipsoid greyish-green lesions on leaf sheath near water level, turning greyish-white with brown margins; sclerotia formation.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High relative humidity (96-97%), temperature 30-32°C, closer planting, high nitrogen.
diseases.prevention: Apply neem cake @ 150 kg/ha, spray neem oil 3%, Carbendazim 50 WP @ 500 g/ha, Azoxystrobin @ 500 ml/ha, or Hexaconazole 75% WG @ 100 mg/l.

diseases.name: False Smut
diseases.symptoms: Affected grains turn into green velvety spore balls, larger than normal grains.
diseases.prevention: Spray Propiconazole 25 EC @ 500 ml/ha or Copper hydroxide 77 WP @ 1.25 kg/ha at boot leaf and 50% flowering.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White downy growth on lower leaf surface, leaves turn yellow, earheads become green leafy structures.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Very high humidity (90%), low temperature (15-25°C), water on leaves.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties CO7, WCC 75, CO(Cu) 9, remove infected plants up to 45 days, spray Metalaxyl + Mancozeb @ 500 g/ha or Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha. Seed treatment with Metalaxyl @ 6 g/kg.

diseases.name: Rust
diseases.symptoms: Brownish-yellow pustules on both leaf surfaces, black teliosori on leaves and sheath.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Closer spacing, presence of alternate host brinjal or Solanum species.
diseases.prevention: Sow during December-May, spray Wettable Sulphur @ 2500 g/ha or Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha, repeat after 10 days if needed.

diseases.name: Ergot
diseases.symptoms: Pinkish sticky fluid from spikelets, black sticky patches, sclerotia formation, inhibited grain formation.
diseases.prevention: Remove ergot-affected seeds with salt solution, treat seeds with Thiram @ 2 g/kg, spray Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha or Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha at 5-10% and 50% flowering.

diseases.name: Root Rot
diseases.symptoms: Brown discoloration at stem near soil, yellowing leaves, shredded bark, plant death in patches.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Day temperature above 30°C, prolonged drought followed by irrigation.
diseases.prevention: Soil application of Pseudomonas fluorescens or Trichoderma viride @ 2.5 kg/ha with FYM, spot drench Carbendazim @ 1 g/l, seed treatment with P. fluorescens @ 10 g/kg.

diseases.name: Leaf Blight
diseases.symptoms: Round to irregular necrotic spots with concentric rings, leading to blight.
diseases.prevention: Spray Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha at disease onset.

diseases.name: Phyllody
diseases.symptoms: Floral parts turn into green leafy structures, bushy plant appearance.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Presence of jassid vector Orosius albicinctus.
diseases.prevention: Remove and destroy infected plants, spray Monocrotophos 36 WSC @ 500 ml/ha, intercrop with redgram (6:1).

diseases.name: Late Blight
diseases.symptoms: Water-soaked spots on leaves turning dark brown to black, white fungal growth on leaf undersides, tuber rot with brown lesions.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Cool, wet weather (15-20°C), high humidity (>90%), prolonged leaf wetness.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties like Kufri Jyoti, apply Mancozeb 75% WP @ 2 kg/ha, or Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64% WP @ 2.5 kg/ha at 7-10 day intervals. Remove infected plant debris.

diseases.name: Common Scab
diseases.symptoms: Rough, corky, or pitted lesions on tuber surface, varying from superficial to deep pits.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Warm, dry soils (20-30°C), high soil pH (>5.5), low soil moisture.
diseases.prevention: Maintain soil pH below 5.5, use resistant varieties, apply sulfur to lower soil pH, rotate with brassica crops, avoid manure amendments.

diseases.name: Black Scurf
diseases.symptoms: Black sclerotia on tuber surface, stem canker, stunted growth, rolled leaves.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Cool, moist soils (15-18°C), high organic matter.
diseases.prevention: Use certified disease-free seeds, treat seeds with Mancozeb @ 3 g/kg, rotate crops, apply Trichoderma viride @ 5 kg/ha.

diseases.name: Fusarium Wilt
diseases.symptoms: Wilting of leaves, yellowing of older leaves, vascular browning, plant collapse.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Warm temperatures (25-30°C), sandy soils, continuous cropping.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, rotate crops for 5-7 years, apply Trichoderma harzianum @ 10 g/kg soil, treat seeds with Carbendazim @ 2 g/kg.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew
diseases.symptoms: Yellow spots on upper leaf surfaces, grayish-white fungal growth on undersides, leaf necrosis.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity (>85%), moderate temperatures (15-25°C), wet leaves.
diseases.prevention: Spray Chlorothalonil 75% WP @ 2 kg/ha or Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, ensure good air circulation, avoid overhead irrigation.

diseases.name: Anthracnose
diseases.symptoms: Dark brown to black spots on leaves and fruits, sunken lesions on fruit with pinkish spore masses.
diseases.prevention: Apply Chlorothalonil @ 2 kg/ha or Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha, use resistant varieties, remove crop debris.

diseases.name: Sweet Potato Virus Disease
diseases.causal_organism: Sweet potato feathery mottle virus (SPFMV) and others
diseases.symptoms: Mottling, chlorosis, stunted growth, deformed leaves, reduced tuber yield.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Warm temperatures (25-30°C), presence of aphid vectors.
diseases.prevention: Use virus-free planting material, control aphid vectors with neem oil 3%, rogue infected plants, rotate crops.

diseases.name: Black Rot
diseases.symptoms: Black, sunken lesions on tubers, bitter taste, stem base rot.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Warm, moist conditions (20-30°C), mechanical injury to tubers.
diseases.prevention: Use disease-free planting material, treat cuttings with Mancozeb @ 3 g/L, avoid wounding during harvest.

diseases.name: Fusarium Wilt
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing, wilting leaves, vascular discoloration, tuber decay.
diseases.prevention: Rotate crops, use resistant varieties, apply Trichoderma viride @ 5 kg/ha, treat soil with Carbendazim @ 2 g/kg.

diseases.name: Leaf Blight
diseases.symptoms: Water-soaked spots on leaves, turning dark brown to black, rapid leaf collapse, corm rot.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity (>90%), warm temperatures (25-30°C), prolonged wet conditions.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, apply Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha or Metalaxyl @ 1 kg/ha, improve drainage, remove infected leaves.

diseases.name: Corm Rot
diseases.symptoms: Soft, water-soaked corms, foul odor, plant wilting, reduced yield.
diseases.prevention: Ensure proper drainage, treat corms with Trichoderma harzianum @ 10 g/kg, rotate crops, avoid over-irrigation.

diseases.name: Dasheen Mosaic Virus
diseases.symptoms: Mosaic patterns, chlorosis, stunted growth, deformed leaves.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Presence of aphid vectors, warm weather (25-30°C).
diseases.prevention: Use virus-free planting material, control aphids with neem oil 3%, rogue infected plants.

diseases.name: Anthracnose
diseases.symptoms: Dark brown to black lesions on leaves and stems, dieback, tuber surface lesions.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity (>85%), warm temperatures (25-30°C), wet conditions.
diseases.prevention: Apply Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha or Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha, use healthy planting material, remove crop debris.

diseases.name: Dry Rot
diseases.symptoms: Dry, shriveled tubers, brown to black internal discoloration, reduced storage life.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High temperatures (28-35°C), mechanical injury, poor storage conditions.
diseases.prevention: Store tubers at 13-15°C, treat with Mancozeb @ 3 g/kg, avoid wounding during harvest.

diseases.name: Yam Mosaic Virus
diseases.symptoms: Mosaic patterns, leaf distortion, stunted growth, reduced tuber size.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Presence of aphid vectors, warm weather (25-30°C).
diseases.prevention: Use virus-free planting material, control aphids with neem oil 3%, rogue infected plants.

diseases.name: Alternaria Leaf Spot
diseases.symptoms: Dark brown to black spots with concentric rings on leaves, yellowing, premature leaf drop.
diseases.prevention: Apply Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, use resistant varieties, rotate crops, remove plant debris.

diseases.name: White Rust
diseases.symptoms: White pustules on leaf undersides, yellowing on upper surfaces, stunted roots.
diseases.prevention: Spray Metalaxyl @ 1 kg/ha, ensure proper spacing, avoid overhead irrigation.

diseases.name: Root Rot
diseases.symptoms: Brown, sunken lesions on roots, wilting, stunted growth.
diseases.prevention: Improve drainage, apply Trichoderma viride @ 5 kg/ha, rotate crops.

diseases.name: Alternaria Leaf Blight
diseases.symptoms: Dark brown to black spots on leaves, yellowing, leaf dieback, reduced root quality.
diseases.prevention: Apply Chlorothalonil @ 2 kg/ha, use resistant varieties, rotate crops, remove debris.

diseases.name: Root-Knot Nematode
diseases.symptoms: Galled, deformed roots, stunted growth, yellowing leaves.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Warm soils (25-30°C), sandy soils, continuous cropping.
diseases.prevention: Rotate with non-host crops, apply neem cake @ 1 t/ha, use resistant varieties.

diseases.name: Bacterial Soft Rot
diseases.symptoms: Soft, watery rot on roots, foul odor, wilting.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High moisture, warm temperatures (25-30°C), mechanical injury.
diseases.prevention: Avoid wounding during harvest, store at 0-2°C, apply copper oxychloride @ 2.5 kg/ha.

diseases.name: Cercospora Leaf Spot
diseases.symptoms: Small, grayish-white spots with brown margins on leaves, yellowing, leaf drop.
diseases.prevention: Apply Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, use resistant varieties, rotate crops, remove debris.

diseases.name: Rhizoctonia Root Rot
diseases.symptoms: Brown to black lesions on roots, wilting, stunted growth.
diseases.prevention: Improve drainage, apply Trichoderma viride @ 5 kg/ha, rotate crops.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White, powdery patches on leaves, yellowing, reduced root quality.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Dry, warm conditions (20-25°C), high humidity at night.
diseases.prevention: Spray Wettable Sulfur @ 2 kg/ha, ensure proper spacing, avoid excess nitrogen.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew
diseases.symptoms: Yellow spots on upper leaf surfaces, grayish-white fungal growth on undersides, leaf necrosis.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity (>85%), moderate temperatures (15-25°C), wet leaves.
diseases.prevention: Spray Chlorothalonil @ 2 kg/ha or Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, ensure good air circulation, avoid overhead irrigation.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White, powdery patches on leaves, yellowing, reduced fruit quality.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Dry, warm conditions (20-25°C), high humidity at night.
diseases.prevention: Spray Wettable Sulfur @ 2 kg/ha, use resistant varieties, avoid excess nitrogen.

diseases.name: Fruit Rot
diseases.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions on fruits, soft rot, fruit drop.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity, warm temperatures (25-30°C), wet conditions.
diseases.prevention: Apply Metalaxyl @ 1 kg/ha, improve drainage, remove infected fruits.

diseases.symptoms: Yellow spots on leaves, grayish-white fungal growth on undersides, leaf necrosis.
diseases.prevention: Spray Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, ensure good air circulation, avoid overhead irrigation.

diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, rotate crops, apply Trichoderma viride @ 5 kg/ha.

diseases.name: Anthracnose

diseases.prevention: Apply Chlorothalonil @ 2 kg/ha, remove infected plant parts, use healthy planting material.

diseases.prevention: Spray Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, ensure good air circulation, avoid overhead irrigation.

diseases.name: Anthracnose
diseases.symptoms: Dark, sunken spots on fruits and leaves, fruit rot.
diseases.prevention: Apply Chlorothalonil @ 2 kg/ha, remove infected plant parts, use healthy planting material.

diseases.name: Yellow Vein Mosaic Virus
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing veins, chlorosis, stunted growth, reduced fruit yield.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Presence of whitefly vectors, warm temperatures (25-30°C).
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties like Arka Anamika, control whiteflies with neem oil 3%, rogue infected plants.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White, powdery patches on leaves, yellowing, reduced fruit quality.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Dry, warm conditions (20-25°C), high humidity at night.
diseases.prevention: Spray Wettable Sulfur @ 2 kg/ha, ensure proper spacing, avoid excess nitrogen.

diseases.name: Cercospora Leaf Spot
diseases.symptoms: Grayish-white spots with brown margins on leaves, yellowing, leaf drop.
diseases.prevention: Apply Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, rotate crops, remove plant debris.

diseases.name: Bacterial Wilt
diseases.symptoms: Sudden wilting, yellowing leaves, brown vascular tissues, plant collapse.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High temperatures (28-35°C), high soil moisture, acidic soils.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, rotate with non-solanaceous crops, treat soil with bleaching powder @ 10 kg/ha, avoid waterlogging.

diseases.name: Phomopsis Blight
diseases.symptoms: Dark brown to black spots on leaves and fruits, fruit rot, stem canker.
diseases.prevention: Apply Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, use disease-free seeds, remove infected plant parts.

diseases.name: Little Leaf Disease
diseases.symptoms: Small, chlorotic leaves, stunted growth, no fruit production.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Presence of leafhopper vectors, warm weather (25-30°C).
diseases.prevention: Control leafhoppers with neem oil 3%, rogue infected plants, use resistant varieties.

diseases.name: Early Blight
diseases.symptoms: Concentric rings (bull’s-eye) on leaves, dark spots with yellow halos, stem lesions.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Warm, wet conditions (24-29°C), high humidity, prolonged leaf wetness.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, apply Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha or Chlorothalonil @ 2 kg/ha, ensure crop rotation, remove plant debris.

diseases.name: Late Blight
diseases.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions on leaves, white fungal growth, fruit rot with greasy appearance.
diseases.prevention: Spray Metalaxyl + Mancozeb @ 2.5 kg/ha, use resistant varieties, avoid overhead irrigation.

diseases.name: Bacterial Wilt
diseases.symptoms: Sudden wilting, yellowing leaves, brown vascular tissues, plant collapse.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High temperatures (28-35°C), high soil moisture, acidic soils.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, rotate with non-solanaceous crops, treat soil with bleaching powder @ 10 kg/ha, avoid waterlogging.

diseases.name: Chocolate Spot
diseases.symptoms: Brown to black spots on leaves, stems, and pods, gray mold in severe cases.
diseases.prevention: Apply Chlorothalonil @ 2 kg/ha, use resistant varieties, ensure proper spacing, remove debris.

diseases.name: Rust
diseases.symptoms: Orange-brown pustules on leaves, yellowing, reduced photosynthesis.
diseases.prevention: Spray Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, use resistant varieties, rotate crops.

diseases.name: Ascochyta Blight
diseases.symptoms: Grayish-white lesions on leaves, stems, and pods, black pycnidia formation.
diseases.prevention: Use disease-free seeds, apply Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha, rotate crops.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew

diseases.favorable_conditions: Warm temperatures (25-30°C), poor drainage, continuous cropping.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties like Grand Naine, apply Trichoderma viride @ 25 g/plant, rotate crops, improve drainage.

diseases.name: Sigatoka Leaf Spot
diseases.symptoms: Grayish streaks on leaves, turning brown to black, reduced photosynthesis, smaller fruits.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity (>80%), moderate temperatures (20-25°C), dense planting.
diseases.prevention: Spray Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha or Propiconazole @ 500 ml/ha, remove affected leaves, ensure proper spacing.

diseases.name: Bunchy Top
diseases.symptoms: Stunted growth, bunched leaves at top, dark green streaks on petioles, no fruit production.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Presence of aphid vectors, warm weather (25-30°C).
diseases.prevention: Use virus-free planting material, control aphids with neem oil 3%, rogue and destroy infected plants.

diseases.name: Bud Rot
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing and wilting of central leaf, rotting of bud, foul odor, tree death.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity, warm temperatures (25-30°C), poor drainage.
diseases.prevention: Apply Bordeaux mixture (1%) to crown, improve drainage, remove infected parts, use resistant varieties.

diseases.name: Leaf Spot

diseases.prevention: Spray Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, remove affected leaves, improve air circulation.

diseases.name: Root Rot
diseases.symptoms: Soft, decayed roots, wilting, yellowing leaves, stunted growth.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity, warm temperatures (25-30°C), waterlogged conditions.
diseases.prevention: Apply Metalaxyl @ 1 kg/ha, ensure proper drainage, use healthy planting material.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White, powdery patches on leaves, yellowing, leaf drop.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Dry, warm conditions (20-25°C), high humidity at night.
diseases.prevention: Spray Wettable Sulfur @ 2 kg/ha, ensure proper spacing, avoid excess nitrogen.

diseases.prevention: Use disease-free bulbs, apply Trichoderma viride @ 5 kg/ha, improve drainage.

diseases.name: Botrytis Blight

diseases.prevention: Apply Captan @ 2 kg/ha, remove infected parts, improve air circulation.

diseases.name: Tuber Rot
diseases.symptoms: Soft, discolored tubers, yellowing leaves, stunted growth.
diseases.prevention: Use disease-free tubers, apply Trichoderma viride @ 5 kg/ha, improve drainage.

diseases.name: Anthracnose
diseases.symptoms: Dark, sunken spots on fruits and leaves, fruit rot, premature fruit drop.
diseases.prevention: Apply Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, remove infected fruits, ensure proper spacing.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White, powdery patches on leaves and fruits, yellowing, reduced fruit quality.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Dry, warm conditions (20-25°C), high humidity at night.

diseases.name: Fruit Rot
diseases.symptoms: Soft, water-soaked lesions on fruits, fruit drop, reduced quality.
diseases.prevention: Apply Metalaxyl @ 1 kg/ha, avoid fruit injury, remove infected fruits.

diseases.name: Fungal Leaf Blight
diseases.symptoms: Dark brown to black spots on leaves, yellowing, leaf drop.
diseases.prevention: Spray Chlorothalonil @ 2 kg/ha, remove affected leaves, ensure proper spacing.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White, powdery patches on leaves, yellowing, reduced flowering.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Dry, warm conditions (20-25°C), high humidity at night.
diseases.prevention: Spray Wettable Sulfur @ 2 kg/ha, ensure proper spacing, avoid excess nitrogen.

diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity, warm temperatures (25-30°C), waterlogged soils.
diseases.prevention: Apply Metalaxyl @ 1 kg/ha, improve drainage, use healthy planting material.

diseases.name: Green Mold
diseases.symptoms: Green, fuzzy growth on substrate, reduced mushroom yield, contamination.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity, poor sterilization, warm temperatures (20-25°C).
diseases.prevention: Sterilize substrate properly, maintain hygiene, use Trichoderma-free compost.

diseases.name: Bacterial Blotch
diseases.symptoms: Brown, sunken spots on mushroom caps, slimy texture, reduced marketability.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity, wet mushroom surfaces, temperatures (15-20°C).
diseases.prevention: Maintain low humidity, avoid water on caps, apply calcium hypochlorite @ 0.5%.

diseases.name: Dry Bubble
diseases.symptoms: Deformed mushrooms, dry, leathery spots, reduced yield.
diseases.prevention: Improve ventilation, apply Prochloraz @ 0.5 g/m², maintain hygiene.

diseases.name: Leaf Spot
diseases.symptoms: Brown to black spots on leaves, yellowing, leaf drop.
diseases.prevention: Spray Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, remove affected leaves, improve air circulation.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White, powdery patches on leaves, yellowing, reduced flowering.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Dry, warm conditions (20-25°C), high humidity at night.
diseases.prevention: Spray Wettable Sulfur @ 2 kg/ha, ensure proper spacing, avoid excess nitrogen.

diseases.name: Root Rot
diseases.symptoms: Brown, decayed roots, wilting, stunted growth.
diseases.prevention: Improve drainage, apply Trichoderma viride @ 5 kg/ha, use healthy planting material.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew
diseases.symptoms: Yellow spots on upper leaf surfaces, grayish-white fungal growth on undersides, leaf necrosis.
diseases.prevention: Spray Metalaxyl @ 1 kg/ha, ensure good air circulation, avoid overhead irrigation.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White, powdery patches on leaves, yellowing, reduced fruit yield.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Dry, warm conditions (20-25°C), high humidity at night.
diseases.prevention: Spray Wettable Sulfur @ 2 kg/ha, use resistant varieties, ensure proper spacing.

diseases.name: Bacterial Wilt
diseases.symptoms: Wilting, yellowing leaves, vine collapse, sticky ooze from cut stems.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Warm temperatures (25-30°C), presence of cucumber beetles.
diseases.prevention: Control cucumber beetles with neem oil 3%, rogue infected plants, rotate crops.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White, powdery patches on leaves, yellowing, reduced fruit quality.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Dry, warm conditions (20-25°C), high humidity at night.
diseases.prevention: Spray Wettable Sulfur @ 2 kg/ha, use resistant varieties, ensure proper spacing.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew
diseases.symptoms: Yellow spots on upper leaf surfaces, grayish-white fungal growth on undersides, leaf necrosis.
diseases.prevention: Spray Metalaxyl @ 1 kg/ha, ensure good air circulation, avoid overhead irrigation.

diseases.name: Fusarium Wilt
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing, wilting leaves, vascular browning, plant collapse.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, apply Trichoderma viride @ 5 kg/ha, rotate crops.

diseases.name: Gray Mold
diseases.symptoms: Grayish mold on fruits, soft rot, flower blight.
diseases.prevention: Apply Captan @ 2 kg/ha, remove infected fruits, improve air circulation.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White, powdery patches on leaves and fruits, leaf curling, reduced fruit quality.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Dry, warm conditions (20-25°C), high humidity at night.
diseases.prevention: Spray Wettable Sulfur @ 2 kg/ha, use resistant varieties, ensure proper spacing.

diseases.name: Verticillium Wilt
diseases.symptoms: Wilting, yellowing leaves, stunted growth, plant collapse.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties, rotate crops, apply Trichoderma viride @ 5 kg/ha.

diseases.name: White Rot
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing, wilting leaves, white fungal growth on bulbs, bulb rot.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Cool, moist conditions (10-20°C), high soil moisture.
diseases.prevention: Use disease-free cloves, apply Trichoderma viride @ 5 kg/ha, rotate crops, improve drainage.

diseases.name: Purple Blotch
diseases.symptoms: Purple to brown lesions on leaves, yellowing, leaf dieback, reduced bulb size.
diseases.prevention: Apply Mancozeb @ 2 kg/ha, use resistant varieties, ensure proper spacing.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing leaves, white to grayish fungal growth on undersides, bulb softening.
diseases.prevention: Spray Metalaxyl @ 1 kg/ha, ensure good air circulation, avoid overhead irrigation.

diseases.name: Blast
diseases.symptoms: Spindle-shaped spots with dark brown margins and gray center on leaves. Node and neck infections cause blackening, brittleness, and grain chaffiness.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Intermittent drizzles, cloudy weather, high humidity (93-99%), low night temperature (15-20°C), excess nitrogen.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant variety CO 47, avoid excess nitrogen, apply nitrogen in three split doses, spray Carbendazim 50WP @ 500g/ha, Tricyclozole 75 WP @ 500g/ha, or Metominostrobin 20 SC @ 500ml/ha. Seed treatment with TNAU Pf liquid formulation @ 10 ml/kg.

diseases.name: Brown Leaf Spot
diseases.symptoms: Rectangular or oval brown spots with discrete margins on leaves, brown lesions on glumes and grains leading to grain discoloration.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Temperature 25-30°C, relative humidity above 80%, excess nitrogen.
diseases.prevention: Spray Metominostrobin @ 500 ml/ha at disease appearance.

diseases.name: Sheath Rot
diseases.symptoms: Dark brown or black patches on uppermost leaf sheath; panicle may not emerge fully; grains discolored.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High humidity, temperature 25-30°C, closer planting, injuries by leaf folder or brown plant hopper.
diseases.prevention: Apply gypsum @ 500 kg/ha, spray neem oil 3%, Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha, Metominostrobin @ 500 ml/ha, or Hexaconazole 75% WG @ 100 mg/l. Seed treatment with Pseudomonas fluorescens @ 10 g/kg.

diseases.name: Sheath Blight
diseases.symptoms: Oval or ellipsoid greyish-green lesions on leaf sheath near water level, turning greyish-white with brown margins; sclerotia formation.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High relative humidity (96-97%), temperature 30-32°C, closer planting, high nitrogen.
diseases.prevention: Apply neem cake @ 150 kg/ha, spray neem oil 3%, Carbendazim 50 WP @ 500 g/ha, Azoxystrobin @ 500 ml/ha, or Hexaconazole 75% WG @ 100 mg/l.

diseases.name: False Smut
diseases.symptoms: Affected grains turn into green velvety spore balls, larger than normal grains.
diseases.prevention: Spray Propiconazole 25 EC @ 500 ml/ha or Copper hydroxide 77 WP @ 1.25 kg/ha at boot leaf and 50% flowering.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White downy growth on lower leaf surface, leaves turn yellow, earheads become green leafy structures.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Very high humidity (90%), low temperature (15-25°C), water on leaves.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties CO7, WCC 75, CO(Cu) 9, remove infected plants up to 45 days, spray Metalaxyl + Mancozeb @ 500 g/ha or Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha. Seed treatment with Metalaxyl @ 6 g/kg.

diseases.name: Rust
diseases.symptoms: Brownish-yellow pustules on both leaf surfaces, black teliosori on leaves and sheath.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Closer spacing, presence of alternate host brinjal or Solanum species.
diseases.prevention: Sow during December-May, spray Wettable Sulphur @ 2500 g/ha or Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha, repeat after 10 days if needed.

diseases.name: Ergot
diseases.symptoms: Pinkish sticky fluid from spikelets, black sticky patches, sclerotia formation, inhibited grain formation.
diseases.prevention: Remove ergot-affected seeds with salt solution, treat seeds with Thiram @ 2 g/kg, spray Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha or Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha at 5-10% and 50% flowering.

diseases.name: Blast
diseases.symptoms: Spindle-shaped spots with brown margins and grey center on leaves, blackening of stem nodes, chaffy or partially filled grains.
diseases.prevention: Spray Edifenphos @ 500 ml/ha, Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha, or Iprobenphos @ 500 ml/ha at symptom onset, repeat at flowering. Seed treatment with Thiram @ 4 g/kg or Pseudomonas fluorescens @ 10 g/kg.

diseases.name: Seedling Blight
diseases.symptoms: Small oval brown spots on leaves merging into larger dark brown lesions, spots on culm, leaf sheath, and panicle.
diseases.prevention: Seed treatment with Thiram @ 4 g/kg, Captan @ 4 g/kg, or Carbendazim @ 2 g/kg.

diseases.name: Mosaic
diseases.symptoms: Chlorotic streaks on leaves, stunted plants, small earheads with ill-filled grains.
diseases.prevention: Rogue out affected plants, spray Monocrotophos 36 WSC @ 700 ml/ha or Methyl Demeton 25 EC @ 500 ml/ha to control vectors.

diseases.name: Downy Mildew
diseases.symptoms: Chlorotic streaks on leaves, white fungal growth, stunted plants with bushy appearance.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Low temperature (21-33°C), high relative humidity (90%), drizzling.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant hybrid CO-6, rogue affected plants, spray Metalaxyl + Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha or Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha at 20 days after sowing.

diseases.name: Rust
diseases.symptoms: Brown pustules on both leaf surfaces, representing uredosori.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Cool temperature, high relative humidity, presence of alternate host Oxalis corniunlata.
diseases.prevention: Spray Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha or Zineb @ 2-4 g/liter at 10-day intervals.

diseases.name: Charcoal Rot
diseases.symptoms: Greyish streak on stalk, shredded pith, sclerotia on vascular bundles, stalk breakage.
diseases.prevention: Follow crop rotation, avoid water/nutrient stress, apply potash @ 80 kg/ha, soil application of Pseudomonas fluorescens or Trichoderma viride @ 2.5 kg/ha with FYM.

diseases.name: Wilt
diseases.symptoms: Gradual wilting, yellowing, and drying of leaves; black streaks in basal stem and root.
diseases.prevention: Seed treatment with Trichoderma viride @ 4 g/kg or Pseudomonas fluorescens @ 10 g/kg, soil application of P. fluorescens or T. viride @ 2.5 kg/ha with FYM.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White powdery growth on lower leaf surface, yellowing and premature leaf shedding.
diseases.prevention: Spray Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha or Wettable Sulphur @ 1500 g/ha.

diseases.name: Sterility Mosaic
diseases.symptoms: Stunted plants, shortened internodes, bushy appearance, mottled small leaves.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Presence of eriophid mite vector Aceria cajani.
diseases.prevention: Rogue out infected plants, spray Fenazaquin @ 1 ml/l on 45 and 60 days after sowing.

diseases.name: Blight
diseases.symptoms: Round or elongated brown lesions with pycnidia on leaflets, stems, and pods.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High rainfall during flowering, temperature 20-25°C, relative humidity 60%.
diseases.prevention: Heat seeds at 40-50°C, spray Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha or Chlorothalonil @ 1 kg/ha, follow crop rotation with cereals.

diseases.name: Rust
diseases.symptoms: Small oval brown powdery lesions on lower leaf surface, dark teliosori later.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Presence of weed host Trigonella polycerata.
diseases.prevention: Destroy weed hosts, spray Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha or Propiconazole @ 1 L/ha.

diseases.name: Wilt
diseases.symptoms: Drooping leaves, dark brown/black vascular browning in stem and root.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High soil temperature (above 25°C), high soil moisture.
diseases.prevention: Soil application of Pseudomonas fluorescens @ 2.5 kg/ha with FYM, seed treatment with Trichoderma viride @ 4 g/kg.

diseases.name: Root Rot
diseases.symptoms: Drooping and drying leaves, brown basal stem, shredded bark with black sclerotia.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Day temperature 30°C, prolonged dry season followed by irrigation.
diseases.prevention: Seed treatment with Trichoderma viride @ 4 g/kg or Pseudomonas fluorescens @ 10 g/kg, apply zinc sulphate @ 25 kg/ha, spot drench Carbendazim @ 1 g/l.

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White powdery growth on upper leaf surface, turning grey, severe at flowering.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Warm humid weather, late kharif and rabi seasons.
diseases.prevention: Spray NSKE 5%, Neem oil 3%, Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha, or Wettable Sulphur @ 1500 g/ha at 10-day intervals.

diseases.name: Yellow Mosaic
diseases.symptoms: Yellow patches on leaves, entire leaf turns yellow, small distorted pods.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Transmitted by whitefly Bemisia tabaci, summer sown crops, weed hosts.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties VBN 4, 6, 7, seed treatment with Imidacloprid @ 5 ml/kg, install yellow sticky traps, spray Methyl Demeton 25 EC @ 500 ml/ha.

diseases.name: Fusarium Wilt
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing and wilting leaves, black streaks in vascular tissues, stunted tap root.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Soil temperature 20-30°C, alkaline heavy soils, high nitrogen/phosphorus, nematode wounds.
diseases.prevention: Treat seeds with Carboxin or Carbendazim @ 2 g/kg, use resistant varieties Varalakshmi, Vijay Pratap, apply potash and FYM, spot drench Carbendazim @ 1 g/l.

diseases.name: Root Rot
diseases.symptoms: Sudden wilting, shredded bark of root and lower stem, sclerotia on affected tissue.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Dry weather after heavy rains, high soil temperature (35-39°C), vegetable/legume hosts.
diseases.prevention: Apply neem cake @ 150 kg/ha, seed treatment with Trichoderma viride @ 10 g/kg, spot drench Carbendazim @ 1 g/l.

diseases.name: Angular Leaf Spot
diseases.symptoms: Angular brown to black water-soaked spots on leaves, black vein, black arm, boll rot.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Soil temperature 28°C, atmospheric temperature 30-40°C, relative humidity 85%, early sowing.
diseases.prevention: Avoid stacking infected plants, spray Streptomycin sulphate + Tetracycline @ 100 g/ha + Copper oxychloride @ 1250 g/ha, repeat at 10-day intervals.

diseases.name: Red Rot
diseases.symptoms: Circular to oval spots with red margin on midrib, red internal cane tissues with white patches, hollow stalks.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Monoculturing, successive ratoon cropping, waterlogged conditions, insect injuries.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties Co86249, CoSi95071, treat setts with Carbendazim @ 0.05%, lengthen irrigation intervals, burn trash, rotate with rice.

diseases.name: Whip Smut
diseases.symptoms: Stunted plants, central shoot turns into a curved whip-like sorus with dark teliospores.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Monoculturing, continuous ratooning, dry weather during tillering.
diseases.prevention: Use resistant varieties Co86249, CoG 93076, treat setts with Triadimefon @ 0.1%, remove smut whips, discourage ratooning if infection exceeds 10%.

diseases.name: Mosaic
diseases.symptoms: Linear chlorotic stripes alternating with dark green areas on young leaves, yellow stripes on leaf sheath and stalk.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Transmitted by aphid Raphalosiphum maidis and infected setts.
diseases.prevention: Select healthy setts, burn crop residues, spray Imidacloprid @ 100 ml/ha to control aphid vectors.

diseases.name: Early Leaf Spot
diseases.symptoms: Circular to irregular reddish-brown to dark brown spots on upper leaf surface with yellow halo, light brown on lower surface.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Prolonged high relative humidity for 3 days, low temperature (20°C), heavy nitrogen/phosphorus, magnesium deficiency.
diseases.prevention: Spray Carbendazim @ 500 g/ha, Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha, or Chlorothalonil @ 1000 g/ha, repeat after 15 days if needed.

diseases.name: Rust
diseases.symptoms: Small powdery pustules on lower leaf surface, yellow to brown discoloration on upper surface, leaf shedding.
diseases.favorable_conditions: High relative humidity (above 85%), heavy rainfall, low temperature (20-25°C).
diseases.prevention: Spray Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha, Chlorothalonil @ 1000 g/ha, or Wettable Sulphur @ 2500 g/ha, repeat after 15 days.

diseases.name: Collar Rot
diseases.symptoms: Circular brown spots on cotyledons, soft rot in collar region, large brown lesions on adult plant stems, wilting.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Prolonged rainy season at seedling stage, low-lying areas.
diseases.prevention: Crop rotation, destroy plant debris, seed treatment with Trichoderma viride @ 4 g/kg, apply castor cake @ 500 kg/ha.

diseases.name: Leaf Blight
diseases.symptoms: Circular brown spots with concentric rings and yellow halo, coalescing into irregular patches, leaf drying.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Rainy weather, cool winter climate, late sown crops.
diseases.prevention: Spray Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha at disease onset.

diseases.name: Rust
diseases.symptoms: Reddish-brown powdery pustules on lower leaf surface, scattered or grouped.
diseases.prevention: Spray Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha, repeat after 10 days if needed.

diseases.name: Head Rot
diseases.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions on lower head surface, turning brown, soft pulpy tissues, black seed mass.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Prolonged rainy weather at flowering, insect damage.
diseases.prevention: Spray Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha at head stage, repeat after 10 days if humid weather persists.

diseases.name: Root Rot
diseases.symptoms: Brown discoloration at stem near soil, yellowing leaves, shredded bark, plant death in patches.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Day temperature above 30°C, prolonged drought followed by irrigation.
diseases.prevention: Soil application of Pseudomonas fluorescens or Trichoderma viride @ 2.5 kg/ha with FYM, spot drench Carbendazim @ 1 g/l, seed treatment with P. fluorescens @ 10 g/kg.

diseases.name: Leaf Blight
diseases.symptoms: Round to irregular necrotic spots with concentric rings, leading to blight.
diseases.prevention: Spray Mancozeb @ 1000 g/ha at disease onset.

diseases.name: Phyllody
diseases.symptoms: Floral parts turn into green leafy structures, bushy plant appearance.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Presence of jassid vector Orosius albicinctus.
diseases.prevention: Remove and destroy infected plants, spray Monocrotophos 36 WSC @ 500 ml/ha, intercrop with redgram (6:1).

diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White powdery fungal growth on leaves, flowers, and young fruits; leaf curling and premature fruit drop.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Cool, dry nights and warm, humid days.
diseases.prevention: Spray wettable sulphur @ 2.5 g/l or Carbendazim @ 1 g/l at the onset of disease.

diseases.name: Anthracnose
diseases.symptoms: Dark brown to black spots on leaves, fruits, and panicles; lesions may coalesce causing large necrotic areas.
diseases.favorable_conditions: Warm, humid, and rainy weather during flowering and fruiting.
diseases.prevention: Spray Copper oxychloride @ 3 g/l or Carbendazim @ 1 g/l at 15-day intervals during flowering.

diseases.name: Bacterial Leaf Spot
diseases.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions turning dark brown with yellow halos, premature leaf drop.
diseases.prevention: Spray Streptocycline @ 200 ppm combined with Copper oxychloride @ 3 g/l during early infection stages.
